name: Santa Escape
overview: A 2019 Christmas gift to the Amiga Community. A game created by Johnny Acevedo of Amiten. A mini-game created for teaching purposes with source code included. It was created for the Amos Course of Amiten Labs 2019. Santa Claus need to collect gift boxes for all children´s all over the world and need to escape to evil skulls.If you survive up to 14 skulls , your mission will be completed! Special power up´s, will help you during the game. Speedy,Bombs,Extra Life,Gems. You start the game with 3 lives.
